MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Hightown, Middlewich Road, Bradwall Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:01PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate third party damage on the underground cable network and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 6:15PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:19PM on 28th October 2020.
